success_text: You met your aim this time
failure_text: You didn’t meet your aim this time
set_aim: Set your aim for the next level
first_step: Avoid obstacles on the ground by Pressing arrow up on keyboard
second_step: Press arrow down on keyboard to Avoid obstacles In the sky
third_step: Jump when you see obstacles that move Close to the ground
fourth_step: Set aim for the next level and make sure to achieve it!
in_top: Your score is better than {percentage}% of players
